title: Add health check endpoint to daemon
description:
Add /health HTTP endpoint for monitoring.

**Response:**
```json
{
  "status": "healthy",
  "version": "0.1.0",
  "uptime": 3600,
  "projectPath": "/path/to/project",
  "stats": {
    "tasks": 42,
    "epics": 5,
    "workers": 2,
    "wsConnections": 3
  }
}
```

**Use cases:**
- Docker health checks
- Monitoring systems
- Plugin connection diagnostics

implementationPlan.description: Modify index.ts to create HTTP server and pass to WebSocketServer. All state changes through StateManager. Log all auto-approval actions to activity.log. Validate constraints before state mutations.
Update WebSocketServer constructor to accept HTTP server instead of creating its own. Add health check handler for GET /health requests.
Add getStats method to StateManager to return counts for tasks, epics, workers
Add version constant to package and export for health endpoint. Track startTime for uptime calculation.

reopenReason: QA FAIL: Missing unhealthy status. DoD requires 'Returns 503 if unhealthy' but /health endpoint always returns 200 with status:'healthy'. Need to add health checks (e.g., state loaded, no fatal errors) and return 503 with status:'unhealthy' when checks fail.
